title: 54%+ WR, 20%+ pickrate, not one nerf.
body:
What's the excuse? Kai'sa is entirely broken, and you cannot deny it when she is still very much so more than a month after her release.

And this isn't even limited to low ELO or high ELO, either. She's freelo across the board.

replies.body:
Remember when everyone was screaming for buffs and riot replied that they wont change her until her winrate stabilizes?

Turns out we dont need that buff. This is why kneejerk reactions and balance do not work well together.

I knew her range was an issue, her E took a bit too long in terms of locking out autos, and her passive being a tad bit weak. But I sure as hell don't remember asking for Q ratio buffs. The ratio is a bit OTT on both Q and W I will say.

-5ms is *way* more of a change than -5 damage on an ult. It's more than *fifty* less damage on an ult.

Base Movement speed and base attack range are the two most vital numbers in the game. If you shift those even *slightly*, you can cause a massive change to winrate. If you buffed, say, Ashe or Mordekaiser by *just* 5 MS, they'd be instantly broken.
This change is as impactful as 0.25 sec more cd on Zoe Q. Please don't embarrass yourself with such statements like it is a huge nerf.
